title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.48 - Markings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.48 - Markings

State Regulations

Each tank vehicle and refueling service vehicle shall
be conspicuously marked, on both sides and rear of the cargo tank in letters of
contrasting color, at least six inches high, with the word
"FLAMMABLE."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.48

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
